item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: Atomicwallet is a project I've been following for while now and I see that you are always organized and well articulated. Well done
item.content:encoded:
Atomicwallet is a project I’ve been following for while now and I see that you are always organized and well articulated.
Well done

item.title: By: Aleebaba
item.dc:creator: Aleebaba
item.description: What an awesome roadmap you have there. Glad to see Atomic wallet taking the bull by its horns and dominating.
item.content:encoded: What an awesome roadmap you have there. Glad to see Atomic wallet taking the bull by its horns and dominating.

item.title: By: Michael Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael Michael
item.description: Incredible achievements recorded by the team so far. I look forward to the new features where I can buy crypto with better rates as well as the borrowing and crypto lending services.
item.content:encoded:
Incredible achievements recorded by the team so far.
I look forward to the new features where I can buy crypto with better rates as well as the borrowing and crypto lending services.

item.title: By: CryptoP
item.dc:creator: CryptoP
item.description: Dual chain AWC interests me a lot. My question is: if AtomicWallet plan to release more coin into circulation, would it be splitter between the chains?
item.content:encoded: Dual chain AWC interests me a lot. My question is: if AtomicWallet plan to release more coin into circulation, would it be splitter between the chains?

item.title: By: Akash Chaudhary
item.dc:creator: Akash Chaudhary
item.description: Atomic team is working according to their roadmap which is a good thing for any project. We are waiting for some more exciting events by the team.
item.content:encoded: Atomic team is working according to their roadmap which is a good thing for any project. We are waiting for some more exciting events by the team.

item.title: By: Tochi
item.dc:creator: Tochi
item.description: What interests me more is the borrowing and lending aspect, that will be soo great if that milestone is achieved. Good one
item.content:encoded: What interests me more is the borrowing and lending aspect, that will be soo great if that milestone is achieved. Good one

item.title: By: Shariful Islam
item.dc:creator: Shariful Islam
item.description: This Roadmap looks solid! End of Q.1 2020 all is going nicely. Undoubtedly 2020 will make atomic wallet more classy! kudos to team!
item.content:encoded:
This Roadmap looks solid!
End of Q.1 2020 all is going nicely. Undoubtedly 2020 will make atomic wallet more classy!
kudos to team!

item.title: By: Musa Aminu
item.dc:creator: Musa Aminu
item.description: The roadmap is quite impressive and I'm really anticipating the hardware wallet integration, it's been on my wishlist for a while.
item.content:encoded: The roadmap is quite impressive and I’m really anticipating the hardware wallet integration, it’s been on my wishlist for a while.
